#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Hacks to force tsearch2 to work =

The following section explains how to a certain locale on Debian.  If you're lucky, your databases are already in the right format.

See http://sandbox.merjis.com/installation for further notes on tsearch2.  This module makes the setup quite a bit more complicated.

=== Hack to get the locale set up correctly ===
DO NOT DO THIS UNLESS YOU MUST -- THIS WILL OVERRIDE YOUR DATABASE STORAGE COMPLETELY AND YOU WILL LOSE ANY OTHER DB INFORMATION YOU MIGHT HAVE.

  * ` /usr/lib/postgresql/8.2/bin/initdb -E UTF-8 --locale=en_US.UTF-8 -D /var/lib/postgresql/8.2/main/`
